Package ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Check
    This class contains utilities for extending the functionality of the classes in org.jscience.mathematics.vectors
    Etc
    Miscellaneous utilities for ODEToJava
    FileSolutionReader
    This class reads the time vector and the solution matrix from a text file.
    Matrix
    This class provides matrix functions that are not provided by JScience in order to support ODEToJava.
    MatrixReader
    Read a matrix of numbers from a file.
    StandardTokenizer
    Tokenize a stream from a reader consisting of arrays of numbers.
    VectorReader
    Read in a vector of numbers from a file.
    VectorWriter
    Write a vector of numbers to a file.
